mapper.update: update quan_depth_detail set depth_id = #{depthId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, detail_type = #{detailType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, detail_price = #{detailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, detail_amount = #{detailAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, date_update = #{dateUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, depth_id, detail_type, detail_price, detail_amount, date_update from quan_depth_detail
